begin delete from htc_dept_income where group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code = #{copy_code} and acc_year = #{acc_year} and plan_code = #{plan_code}; insert into htc_dept_income (group_id, hos_id, copy_code, acc_year, acc_month , plan_code, appl_dept_id, appl_dept_no, exec_dept_id, exec_dept_no , charge_item_id, num, money)
with proj_dept as ( select hps.group_id, hps.hos_id, hps.copy_code, hps.plan_code, hdr.dept_id, hpdd.proj_dept_id, hpdd.proj_dept_no, hps.start_month, hps.end_month from htc_plan_set hps left join htc_plan_dept hpd on hps.group_id = hpd.group_id and hps.hos_id = hpd.hos_id and hps.copy_code = hpd.copy_code and hps.acc_year = hpd.acc_year and hps.plan_code = hpd.plan_code left join htc_dept_rela hdr on hdr.group_id = hps.group_id and hdr.hos_id = hps.hos_id and hdr.copy_code = hps.copy_code and hdr.acc_year = hps.acc_year and hdr.plan_code = hps.plan_code and hdr.proj_dept_id = hpd.proj_dept_id left join htc_proj_dept_dict hpdd on hdr.group_id = hpdd.group_id and hdr.hos_id = hpdd.hos_id and hdr.copy_code = hpdd.copy_code and hdr.proj_dept_id = hpdd.proj_dept_id where hps.group_id = #{group_id} and hps.hos_id = #{hos_id} and hps.copy_code = #{copy_code} and hps.acc_year = #{acc_year} and hps.plan_code = #{plan_code} and hpdd.is_disable = 0 ) select cid.group_id, cid.hos_id, cid.copy_code, cid.acc_year, cid.acc_month , appl_pd.plan_code, appl_pd.proj_dept_id as appl_dept_id, appl_pd.proj_dept_no as appl_dept_no, exec_pd.proj_dept_id as exec_dept_id, exec_pd.proj_dept_no as exec_dept_id , cid.charge_item_id, sum(cid.num) as num, sum(cid.money) as money from cost_income_detail cid inner join proj_dept appl_pd on cid.group_id = appl_pd.group_id and cid.hos_id = appl_pd.hos_id and cid.copy_code = appl_pd.copy_code and cid.appl_dept_id = appl_pd.dept_id inner join proj_dept exec_pd on cid.group_id = exec_pd.group_id and cid.hos_id = exec_pd.hos_id and cid.copy_code = exec_pd.copy_code and cid.exec_dept_id = exec_pd.dept_id where cid.group_id = #{group_id} and cid.hos_id = #{hos_id} and cid.copy_code = #{copy_code} and cid.acc_year = #{acc_year} and cid.acc_month between appl_pd.start_month and appl_pd.end_month and cid.acc_month between exec_pd.start_month and exec_pd.end_month group by cid.group_id, cid.hos_id, cid.copy_code, cid.acc_year, cid.acc_month, appl_pd.plan_code, appl_pd.proj_dept_id, appl_pd.proj_dept_no, exec_pd.proj_dept_id, exec_pd.proj_dept_no, cid.charge_item_id; end;
